languages.text: "Говорят, Футфол должен был стать его личным миром-дворцом, однако строительство затянулось на долгие десятилетия, и господин Парсимус... в итоге скончался от старости. Его враги тут же разорвали Футфол на части и превратили его в привычный нам оплот Человечества. Заполненный бандитами, каперами, дельцами и... Вольными Торговцами". {n}Довольная собой, Кассия чуть кивает, давая понять остальным, что закончила речь.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Говорят, Футфол должен был стать его личным миром-дворцом, однако строительство затянулось на долгие десятилетия, и господин Парсимус... в итоге скончался от старости. Его враги тут же разорвали Футфол на части и превратили его в привычный нам оплот Человечества. Заполненный бандитами, каперами, дельцами и... Вольными Торговцами". {n}Довольная собой, Кассия чуть кивает, давая понять остальным, что закончила речь.{/n}

languages.text: "They say Footfall was meant to be his personal palace world, but the construction dragged on for decades, and Lord Parsimus... eventually died of old age. His enemies instantly tore Footfall to pieces and turned it into the bastion of Humanity we know today. One that is full of bandits, privateers, hustlers, and... Rogue Traders." {n}Pleased with herself, Cassia nods slightly to let everyone know that the lecture is over.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Говорят, Футфол должен был стать его личным миром-дворцом, однако строительство затянулось на долгие десятилетия, и господин Парсимус... в итоге скончался от старости. Его враги тут же разорвали Футфол на части и превратили его в привычный нам оплот Человечества. Заполненный бандитами, каперами, дельцами и... Вольными Торговцами". {n}Довольная собой, Кассия чуть кивает, давая понять остальным, что закончила речь.{/n}

His enemies instantly tore Footfall to pieces and turned into the bastion of Humanity we all know. One that is full of bandits, privateers, hustlers, and... Rogue Traders." {n}Pleased with herself, Cassia nods slightly to let everyone know that the lecture is over.{/n}

His enemies instantly tore Footfall to pieces and turned it into the bastion of Humanity we know today. One that is full of bandits, privateers, hustlers, and... Rogue Traders." {n}Pleased with herself, Cassia nods slightly to let everyone know that the lecture is over.{/n}

languages.text: 「フットフォールは彼の個人的な宮廷惑星になる予定だったそうですけれど、建設が何十年も長引いてしまい、ロード・パルシムスは…やがて老齢で亡くなってしまいました。彼の亡き後、彼の敵は即座にフットフォールを破壊し、今日我々が知るような…盗賊、山賊、私掠船、詐欺師…そして、自由開拓者が集まる、人類の要塞へと変えてしまったのです」{n}満足したカシアは、講義は終了したと示すように軽くうなずいた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "They say Footfall was meant to be his personal palace world, but the construction dragged on for decades, and Lord Parsimus... eventually died of old age. His enemies instantly tore Footfall to pieces and turned it into the bastion of Humanity we know today. One that is full of bandits, privateers, hustlers, and... Rogue Traders." {n}Pleased with herself, Cassia nods slightly to let everyone know that the lecture is over.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「フットフォールは彼の個人的な宮廷惑星になる予定だったそうですけれど、建設が何十年も長引いてしまい、ロード・パルシムスは…やがて老齢で亡くなってしまいました。彼の亡き後、彼の敵は即座にフットフォールを破壊し、今日我々が知るような…盗賊、山賊、私掠船、詐欺師…そして、自由開拓者が集まる、人類の要塞へと変えてしまったのです」{n}満足したカシアは、講義は終了したと示すように軽くうなずいた。{/n}

languages.text: “他们说，落脚港本该成为他个人的宫殿世界，但落脚港的建设拖了数十年，而帕西姆斯领主……最终老死了。在那之后，他的敌人立刻将落脚港撕成了碎片，把它变成了如今我们熟知的人类堡垒，一座到处充斥着强盗、私掠者、骗子和……行商浪人的堡垒。”{n}卡西娅满意地点了点头，示意大家她的讲座结束了。{/n}
languages.original_text: "They say Footfall was meant to be his personal palace world, but the construction dragged on for decades, and Lord Parsimus... eventually died of old age. His enemies instantly tore Footfall to pieces and turned it into the bastion of Humanity we know today. One that is full of bandits, privateers, hustlers, and... Rogue Traders." {n}Pleased with herself, Cassia nods slightly to let everyone know that the lecture is over.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “他们说，落脚港本该成为他个人的宫殿世界，但落脚港的建设拖了数十年，而帕西姆斯领主……最终老死了。在那之后，他的敌人立刻将落脚港撕成了碎片，把它变成了如今我们熟知的人类堡垒，一座到处充斥着强盗、私掠者、骗子和……行商浪人的堡垒。”{n}卡西娅满意地点了点头，示意大家她的讲座结束了。{/n}

languages.text: «Dicen que Paso iba a ser su mundo palacio personal, pero la construcción duró décadas y, al final, Lord Parsimus... murió de viejo. Sus enemigos despedazaron Paso y lo convirtieron en el bastión de la Humanidad que conocemos hoy. Un bastión lleno de bandidos, corsarios, timadores y... Comerciantes Independientes». {n}Satisfecha, Cassia asiente para confirmar que su discurso ha terminado.{/n}
languages.original_text: "They say Footfall was meant to be his personal palace world, but the construction dragged on for decades, and Lord Parsimus... eventually died of old age. His enemies instantly tore Footfall to pieces and turned it into the bastion of Humanity we know today. One that is full of bandits, privateers, hustlers, and... Rogue Traders." {n}Pleased with herself, Cassia nods slightly to let everyone know that the lecture is over.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Dicen que Paso iba a ser su mundo palacio personal, pero la construcción duró décadas y, al final, Lord Parsimus... murió de viejo. Sus enemigos despedazaron Paso y lo convirtieron en el bastión de la Humanidad que conocemos hoy. Un bastión lleno de bandidos, corsarios, timadores y... Comerciantes Independientes». {n}Satisfecha, Cassia asiente para confirmar que su discurso ha terminado.{/n}

languages.text: « On raconte que Castel avait pour vocation d'être son propre monde et palais, mais les travaux ont pris plusieurs décennies et le seigneur Parsimus est mort de vieillesse avant de voir le résultat. Ses ennemis se sont empressés de mettre la station en pièces pour en faire le bastion de l'humanité que nous connaissons aujourd'hui. Un bastion abritant bandits, corsaires, escrocs et... libres-marchands. » {n}Satisfaite, Cassia hoche légèrement la tête pour indiquer à ses auditeurs que sa leçon est terminée.{/n}
languages.original_text: "They say Footfall was meant to be his personal palace world, but the construction dragged on for decades, and Lord Parsimus... eventually died of old age. His enemies instantly tore Footfall to pieces and turned it into the bastion of Humanity we know today. One that is full of bandits, privateers, hustlers, and... Rogue Traders." {n}Pleased with herself, Cassia nods slightly to let everyone know that the lecture is over.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « On raconte que Castel avait pour vocation d'être son propre monde et palais, mais les travaux ont pris plusieurs décennies et le seigneur Parsimus est mort de vieillesse avant de voir le résultat. Ses ennemis se sont empressés de mettre la station en pièces pour en faire le bastion de l'humanité que nous connaissons aujourd'hui. Un bastion abritant bandits, corsaires, escrocs et... libres-marchands. » {n}Satisfaite, Cassia hoche légèrement la tête pour indiquer à ses auditeurs que sa leçon est terminée.{/n}

languages.text: "Es heißt, Footfall sollte seine persönliche Palastwelt werden, aber der Bau zog sich über Jahrzehnte hin, und schließlich ... starb Lord Parsimus an Altersschwäche. Seine Feinde rissen Footfall unverzüglich praktisch in Stücke und machten daraus die Bastion der Menschheit, die wir heute kennen. Voller Banditen, Freibeuter, Betrüger und ... Freihändler." {n}Cassia nickt zufrieden und signalisiert damit allen, dass der Vortrag vorbei ist.{/n}
languages.original_text: "They say Footfall was meant to be his personal palace world, but the construction dragged on for decades, and Lord Parsimus... eventually died of old age. His enemies instantly tore Footfall to pieces and turned it into the bastion of Humanity we know today. One that is full of bandits, privateers, hustlers, and... Rogue Traders." {n}Pleased with herself, Cassia nods slightly to let everyone know that the lecture is over.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Es heißt, Footfall sollte seine persönliche Palastwelt werden, aber der Bau zog sich über Jahrzehnte hin, und schließlich ... starb Lord Parsimus an Altersschwäche. Seine Feinde rissen Footfall unverzüglich praktisch in Stücke und machten daraus die Bastion der Menschheit, die wir heute kennen. Voller Banditen, Freibeuter, Betrüger und ... Freihändler." {n}Cassia nickt zufrieden und signalisiert damit allen, dass der Vortrag vorbei ist.{/n}

languages.text: "Binliman'ı yaptırırken aklında burayı şahsi saray dünyası yapmak varmış lakin inşa süreci on yılları bulunca Lord Parsimus'un ömrü tamamlandığını görmeye yetmemiş. Vefatını fırsat bilen düşmanları Binliman'ı yerle bir etmiş ve bugün bildiğimiz hâliyle İnsanlığın kalesine çevirmiş. Yani haydutlarla, korsanlarla, dolandırıcılarla ve tabii Hür Tacirlerle dolu bir mekâna." {n}Cassia, kendinden memnun bir tavırla başını hafifçe sallayarak herkese dersin sona erdiğini bildiriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "They say Footfall was meant to be his personal palace world, but the construction dragged on for decades, and Lord Parsimus... eventually died of old age. His enemies instantly tore Footfall to pieces and turned it into the bastion of Humanity we know today. One that is full of bandits, privateers, hustlers, and... Rogue Traders." {n}Pleased with herself, Cassia nods slightly to let everyone know that the lecture is over.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Binliman'ın onun kişisel saray dünyası olması planlandığı söylenir ama inşa süreci on yıllara yayılmış ve Lord Parsimus yaşı ilerleyince vefat etmiş. Düşmanları Binliman'ı anında paramparça etmiş ve onu bugün bildiğimiz hâline, İnsanlığın bir kalesine dönüştürmüş. Haydutlarla, korsanlarla, dolandırıcılarla ve Hür Tacirlerle dolu bir yere." {n}Sözlerini tamamlamaktan memnun olan Cassia hafifçe başını sallayarak herkese dersin sona erdiğini bildiriyor.{/n}
